channel.title: Can my server be saved?
channel.description:
Ok about an hour ago my server suffered from a major crash. I saved the client files but re-downloaded and extracted the source files. Now everytime I try to login the source's command prompt has this message:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:117)
And Im not able to login to ANY account.... Please tell me.. can my server be saved or must i start from scratch? (Prolly not gonna start from scratch anyway...just switch to a 508. ONLY if it cant be saved..)
-Thanks for your time Zukyak

item.title: Can my server be saved?
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

something looks wrong with your item.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: Can my server be saved?
item.dc:creator: @Nuggetdabest Nuggetdabest
item.description:
@Nuggetdabest wrote:

[quote=“Zombiepwns, post:2, topic:319687”]You’re server automatically saves unless it crashes. Otherwise it rolls the game back several minutes.
Were there problems with the source files after the crash. You need to tell us why you replaced the source files…[/quote]

What He said. It’s basicly the same as runescape except runescape doesn’t crash.

Read full topic

item.title: Can my server be saved?
item.dc:creator: @Zombiepwns Zombiepwns
item.description:
@Zombiepwns wrote:

You’re server automatically saves unless it crashes. Otherwise it rolls the game back several minutes.
Were there problems with the source files after the crash. You need to tell us why you replaced the source files…
